SEARCH
Package com.jeopardy

Class Question

java.lang.Object
com.jeopardy.Question
public class Question extends Object
Represents a question in a Jeopardy game. Each question has text, a point value, multiple choice options, and a correct answer.

  • Constructor Details

    • Question

      public Question(String questionText, int value, Map<String,String> options, String correctAnswer)
      Constructs a Question with the given parameters.
      Parameters:
      questionText - the text of the question
      value - the point value of this question
      options - a Map of answer keys to answer text (e.g., "A" -> "Answer A")
      correctAnswer - the key of the correct answer (e.g., "A")

  • Method Details

    • checkAnswer

      public boolean checkAnswer(String answer)
      Checks if the given answer matches the correct answer (case-insensitive).
      Parameters:
      answer - the answer to check
      Returns:
      true if the answer is correct, false otherwise

    • getQuestionText

      public String getQuestionText()
      Retrieves the text of this question.
      Returns:
      the question text

      Retrieves the point value of this question.

      public Map<String,String> getOptions()
      Retrieves the answer options for this question.
      Returns:
      a Map of answer keys to answer text

    • getCorrectAnswer

      public String getCorrectAnswer()
      Retrieves the correct answer key for this question.
      Returns:
      the correct answer key

    • isAnswered

      public boolean isAnswered()
      Checks if this question has been answered during the game.
      Returns:
      true if the question has been answered, false otherwise

    • setAnswered

      public void setAnswered(boolean answered)
      Sets whether this question has been answered.
      Parameters:
      answered - true if the question has been answered, false otherwise
